oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Why I Recommend The Vaccination Of Cattle For BVD
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vonderfecht, Harold E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine immunization
bovine virus diarrhea (BYD) vaccination
BYD virus
BYD vaccination
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the last few years, probably no one bovine immunization has received more discussion than bovine virus diarrhea (BYD) vaccination. However, in the light of more intensive field studies, laboratory evidence of its importance in bovine , respiratory disease (BRO) andabortions, greater knowledge of immunology, use of different strains of the BYD virus for production of vaccine and improved methods in the production of BYD vaccines, I believe we need to re-examin and re-evaluate the importance of BYD vaccination.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1979; 158-162
